1383040.name: Delivery Company Clicker
1383040.description: Deliver Company Clicker is a small game with a cozy atmosphere and main goal to unlock every upgrade while listening to a good music. You will look at different flags and unique customisation items and workers hired by you will bring you lots of money to buy everything. You will be able to unlock bird, ship, pearl and lots of other beautiful things, flags with some variants and you could upgrade your company by buying racks, or something to eat like chips or soda together with internet connection to increase your money per click.
1383040.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
